title: Ticket #3186: condor_q -jobsads fails silently
description:
condor_q -jobads fails silently if the provided file cannot be read or is not properly formatted.

The net result is that it then continues by contacting the schedd and returning the list of jobs from the schedd. The expected semantics is to get an error value.

This makes it hard to use as a reliable tool for parsing a jobads file.
remarks:
Never mind....

I don't know what I was testing, but I cannot reproduce it anymore! condor_q -jobads does work as expected.

Sorry for the noise.
creator: sfiligoi
